results.title: COVID-19 and Risk of Acute Ischemic Stroke and Acute Lung Injury in Patients With Type II Diabetes Mellitus: The Anti-inflammatory Role of Metformin
results.text_hl: Further studies are needed to observe the link between @<m>DISEASE_Ischemic_Stroke</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000083242 @@@AIS@@@ in @DISEASE_COVID_19 @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@COVID-19 diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy.

citations.NLM: Al-Kuraishy HM, Al-Gareeb AI, Alblihed M, Cruz-Martins N, Batiha GE. COVID-19 and Risk of Acute Ischemic Stroke and Acute Lung Injury in Patients With Type II Diabetes Mellitus: The Anti-inflammatory Role of Metformin Front Med (Lausanne). 2021;8():644295. PMID: 33718411

results.title: Metformin treatment and acute ischemic stroke outcomes in patients with type 2 diabetes: a retrospective cohort study.
results.text_hl: Herein, we examined the efficacy of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment on prognosis in @<m>DISEASE_Ischemic_Stroke</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000083242 @@@acute ischemic stroke@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Ischemic_Stroke</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000083242 @@@AIS@@@) @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@, and assessed the optimal treatment timing and duration.

citations.NLM: Jian Y, Wang H, Zhao L, Li T, Zhang L, Wang X, Zhang Y, Li Y, Dang M, Lu Z, Lu J, Feng Y, Yang Y, Zhang G. Metformin treatment and acute ischemic stroke outcomes in patients with type 2 diabetes: a retrospective cohort study. Neurol Sci. 2022 Nov 29;():. PMID: 36445542

results.title: The Impact of Pre-Stroke Metformin Use on Clinical Outcomes after Acute Ischemic Stroke: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis.
results.text_hl: All studies providing separate data on @<m>DISEASE_Ischemic_Stroke</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000083242 @@@AIS@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ using @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ were included, and statistical analysis was conducted using R software to pooled odds ratios (ORs) and their corresponding 95% confidence intervals (CI).

citations.NLM: Pakkam M, Orscelik A, Musmar B, Tolba H, Ghozy S, Senol YC, Bilgin C, Nayak SS, Kadirvel R, Brinjikji W, Rabinstein AA, Kallmes DF. The Impact of Pre-Stroke Metformin Use on Clinical Outcomes after Acute Ischemic Stroke: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis. J Stroke Cerebrovasc Dis. 2024 Apr 9;33(6):107716. PMID: 38604350
